conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Mi deporte favorito es el fútbol.

conversation_summary: A conversation about each person's favorite sport.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Sí, me encanta correr en el parque.

conversation_summary: A conversation about enjoying exercise, especially running in the park.

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Sí, he estado haciendo pesas para fortalecer mis brazos.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Yo también quiero fortalecer mi cuerpo.

conversation_summary: A conversation about going to the gym to strengthen arms and body.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: Yo también quiero aprender a bailar salsa.

conversation_summary: A conversation about wanting to do a physical activity, specifically salsa dancing.

conversation.speaker: person1
conversation.message: ¿Has visto la última Copa del Mundo de fútbol?

conversation.speaker: person2
conversation.message: Sí, fue emocionante ver a España ganar el título.

conversation_summary: A conversation about the latest World Cup of soccer, specifically Spain winning the title.
